item.description:
Join me at Gary's Restaurant & Sports Lounge in Rochester to dance to Spiral Circus! This is a great band for dancing with both a male and female lead singer. They play old and new songs and always have a high level of energy! You will NOT be disappointed! Come a little early and meet people from the other groups. The band starts at 9:30 and plays until 1:00. Check out the band athttp://www.spiralcirc...

 

UPDATE!  There is a 5$ cover charge after 8:00 and the band will start at 9:00 and not at 9:30.  So I will be there at 7:30 instead of 8:30 for everyone that wants to show up before the cover charge.
item.name: Spiral Circus @ Gary's
